member.name: T:System.Xml.XmlNodeOrder
member.summary: Describes the document order of a node compared to a second node.

member.name: F:System.Xml.XmlNodeOrder.After
member.summary: The current node of this navigator is after the current node of the supplied navigator.

member.name: F:System.Xml.XmlNodeOrder.Before
member.summary: The current node of this navigator is before the current node of the supplied navigator.

member.name: F:System.Xml.XmlNodeOrder.Same
member.summary: The two navigators are positioned on the same node.

member.name: F:System.Xml.XmlNodeOrder.Unknown
member.summary: The node positions cannot be determined in document order, relative to each other. This could occur if the two nodes reside in different trees.

member.name: T:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable
member.summary: Provides an accessor to the class.

member.name: M:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable.CreateNavigator
member.summary: Returns a new object.
member.returns: An object.

member.name: T:System.Xml.XPath.XmlCaseOrder
member.summary: Specifies the sort order for uppercase and lowercase letters.

member.name: F:System.Xml.XPath.XmlCaseOrder.LowerFirst
member.summary: Lowercase letters are sorted before uppercase letters.

member.name: F:System.Xml.XPath.XmlCaseOrder.None
member.summary: Ignore the case.

member.name: F:System.Xml.XPath.XmlCaseOrder.UpperFirst
member.summary: Uppercase letters are sorted before lowercase letters.

member.name: T:System.Xml.XPath.XmlDataType
member.summary: Specifies the data type used to determine sort order.

member.name: F:System.Xml.XPath.XmlDataType.Number
member.summary: Values are sorted numerically.

member.name: F:System.Xml.XPath.XmlDataType.Text
member.summary: Values are sorted alphabetically.

member.name: T:System.Xml.XPath.XmlSortOrder
member.summary: Specifies the sort order.

member.name: F:System.Xml.XPath.XmlSortOrder.Ascending
member.summary: Nodes are sorted in ascending order. For example, if the numbers 1,2,3, and 4 are sorted in ascending order, they appear as 1,2,3,4.

member.name: F:System.Xml.XPath.XmlSortOrder.Descending
member.summary: Nodes are sorted in descending order. For example, if the numbers 1,2,3, and 4 are sorted in descending order, they appear as, 4,3,2,1.

member.name: T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNamespaceScope
member.summary: Defines the namespace scope.

member.name: F:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNamespaceScope.All
member.summary: Returns all namespaces defined in the scope of the current node. This includes the xmlns:xml namespace which is always declared implicitly. The order of the namespaces returned is not defined.

member.name: F:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNamespaceScope.ExcludeXml
member.summary: Returns all namespaces defined in the scope of the current node, excluding the xmlns:xml namespace. The xmlns:xml namespace is always declared implicitly. The order of the namespaces returned is not defined.

member.name: F:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNamespaceScope.Local
member.summary: Returns all namespaces that are defined locally at the current node.

member.summary: A node with white space characters and xml:space set to preserve.

member.name: F:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Text
member.summary: The text content of a node. Equivalent to the Document Object Model (DOM) Text and CDATA node types. Contains at least one character.

member.name: F:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType.Whitespace
member.summary: A node with only white space characters and no significant white space. White space characters are #x20, #x9, #xD, or #xA.

member.name: T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType
member.summary: Specifies the return type of the XPath expression.

member.name: F:System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType.Any
member.summary: Any of the XPath node types.

member.name: F:System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType.Boolean
member.summary: A true or false value.

member.name: F:System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType.Error
member.summary: The expression does not evaluate to the correct XPath type.

member.name: F:System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType.Navigator
member.summary: A tree fragment.

member.name: F:System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType.NodeSet
member.summary: A node collection.

member.name: F:System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType.Number
member.summary: A numeric value.

member.name: F:System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType.String
member.summary: A value.
